text.text: But for some reason they really insist on getting dirty with the princess.
They even got cursed by the witch (by queen's command) in order to distance them two.
They can't recognize each other because of the curse.
In order to ensure that they don't even end up together, the queen tasked you to pretend like you're the real princess.
This is a perfect opportunity to get the frog's love!
Get their signature and seal the deal.
